form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Gillibrand introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Erie Canalway National Heritage Corridor Act.

section.text: Section 804(j) of the Erie Canalway National Heritage Corridor Act (16 U.S.C. 461 note; Public Law 106â€“554) is amended by striking 15 and inserting 30.
